name: Apprentice Wizard

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
â€¢ 1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield

spells: fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation, burning hands, disguise self, shield
description:
Apprentices are novice arcane spellcasters who serve more experienced wizards or attend school. They perform menial work such as cooking and cleaning in exchange for education in the ways of magic.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 209, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Tomb of Annihilation, Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath, Eberron: Rising from the Last War
